txt.en: A group of Anâkhi cultists stand at the passage even deeper to the mine, guarding something important. Their rituals must be stopped.\n\nDefeat the Anâkhi Ensemble.

We have discovered a dangerous cult of usan-kûni worshippers hiding in our own back-yard. They call themselves Anâkhi, and have made their home inside Ashunûg, a salt mine in northern Ambarûl that has long been abandoned. We are only recently freed of Sauron, the All-seeing, and must not allow this new cult to take hold. The Anâkhi scorpion worshippers must be driven from our lands.
Ashunûg, the Fane of the Accursed -- Solo/Duo
A monstrous scorpion dwells deep within the mine of Ashunûg. This must be the Anâkhi's idol, and it must be destroyed before it can bring terror to the nearby lands in Ambarûl.\n\nDefeat Nâkhugir.
A fierce brute is guarding the way deeper into the mines of Ashunûg.\n\nDefeat Eshêgur the Reaper.
